verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H259>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2320>[month,<s%>] on the <S%H259>first<s%> of the month, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and to his <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> <S%H413>'Whom<s%> <S%H4310><s%> are you <S%H1819>like<s%> in your <S%H1433>greatness<s%>?

<S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> <S%H804>Assyria<s%> [was] a <S%H730>cedar<s%> in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> With <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H6057>branches<s%> and <S%H2793>forest<s%> <S%H6751>shade,<s%> And <S%H6967>very<s%> <S%H6967>high;<s%> And its <S%H6788>top<s%> was <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds.<s%>

'The <S%H4325>waters<s%> made it <S%H1431>grow,<s%> the <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H7311>made<s%> it <S%H7311>high.<s%> With its <S%H5104>rivers<s%> it continually <S%H1980>extended<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> its <S%H4302>planting<s%> <S%H4302>place,<s%> And it <S%H7971>sent<s%> out its <S%H8585>channels<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

<S%H5921>'Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> its <S%H6967>height<s%> was <S%H1361>loftier<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> And its <S%H5634>boughs<s%> <S%H7235>became<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> and its <S%H6288>branches<s%> <S%H748>long<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> as it <S%H7971>spread<s%> them out.

<S%H3605>'All<s%> the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H7077>nested<s%> in its <S%H5589>boughs,<s%> And <S%H8478>under<s%> its <S%H6288>branches<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H3205>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> under its <S%H6738>shade.<s%>

'So it was <S%H3302>beautiful<s%> in its <S%H1433>greatness,<s%> in the <S%H753>length<s%> of its <S%H1808>branches;<s%> For its <S%H8328>roots<s%> <S%H1961>extended<s%> to <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

'The <S%H730>cedars<s%> in God's <S%H1588>garden<s%> could not <S%H6004>match<s%> it; The <S%H1265>cypresses<s%> could not <S%H1819>compare<s%> with its <S%H5589>boughs,<s%> And the <S%H6196>plane<s%> <S%H6196>trees<s%> could not match its <S%H6288>branches.<s%> <S%H3605>No<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> in God's <S%H1588>garden<s%> could <S%H1819>compare<s%> with it in its <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>

'I <S%H6213>made<s%> it <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> with the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of its <S%H1808>branches,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> were <S%H7065>jealous<s%> of it.

<S%H3651>'Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> it is <S%H1361>high<s%> in <S%H6967>stature,<s%> and it has <S%H5414>set<s%> its <S%H6788>top<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> and its <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H7311>haughty<s%> in its <S%H1363>loftiness,<s%>

therefore, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H9012>despot<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> he will <S%H6213>thoroughly<s%> <S%H6213>deal<s%> with it. According to its <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> I have <S%H1644>driven<s%> it <S%H1644>away.<s%>

"And <S%H2114>alien<s%> <S%H6184>tyrants<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H3772>cut<s%> it <S%H3772>down<s%> and <S%H5203>left<s%> it; on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1516>valleys<s%> its <S%H1808>branches<s%> have <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> and its <S%H6288>boughs<s%> have been <S%H7665>broken<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H650>ravines<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> have <S%H3381>gone<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from its <S%H6738>shade<s%> and <S%H5203>left<s%> it.

"On its <S%H4658>ruin<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> will <S%H7931>dwell.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> will be on its [fallen] <S%H6288>branches<s%>

in <S%H4616>order<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> may not be <S%H1361>exalted<s%> in their <S%H6967>stature,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> their <S%H6788>top<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> their well-watered <S%H9012>mighty<s%> ones <S%H5975>stand<s%> [erect] in their <S%H6967>height.<s%> For they have <S%H3605>all<s%> been <S%H5414>given<s%> over to <S%H4194>death,<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8482>beneath,<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> with those who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%> "

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "On the <S%H3117>day<s%> when it <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> I <S%H56>caused<s%> <S%H56>lamentations;<s%> I <S%H3680>closed<s%> the <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> it and <S%H4513>held<s%> <S%H4513>back<s%> its <S%H5104>rivers.<s%> And [its] <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H3607>stopped<s%> up, and I made <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> <S%H6937>mourn<s%> for it, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H5968>wilted<s%> <S%H5968>away<s%> on <S%H5921>account<s%> of it.

"I made the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H7493>quake<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of its <S%H4658>fall<s%> when I made it <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> with those who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the well-watered <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> the <S%H4005>choicest<s%> and <S%H2896>best<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> were <S%H5162>comforted<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8482>beneath.<s%>

"They <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with it to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> to those who were <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and those who were its <S%H2220>strength<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> under its <S%H6738>shade<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

"To <S%H4310>which<s%> among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> are you <S%H3602>thus<s%> <S%H1819>equal<s%> in <S%H9202>glory<s%> and <S%H1433>greatness<s%>? Yet you will be <S%H3381>brought<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8482>beneath;<s%> you will <S%H7901>lie<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> with those who were <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%> So is <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1995>multitude!<s%> <S%H5002>'"declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%> "
